item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会就《源氏物语》中的 "礼盒 "达成和解
item.description: 据知情人士透露，美国联邦贸易委员会正准备与热门视频游戏《源氏冲击》背后的公司达成和解，因为人们担心该游戏的赚钱机制具有欺骗性。【原文：The US Federal Trade Commission is preparing to settle with the company behind the popular video game Genshin Impact over concerns that the money-making mechanics of the game were deceptive, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 联邦调查局警告特工称黑客窃取了他们的通话记录
item.description: 彭博新闻社查阅的一份文件显示，联邦调查局领导人警告说，他们认为去年入侵 AT&T 公司系统的黑客窃取了其特工数月的通话和短信记录，从而引发了该局内部保护秘密线人身份的竞赛。【原文：FBI leaders have warned that they believe hackers who broke into AT&T Inc.’s system last year stole months of their agents’ call and text logs, setting off a race within the bureau to protect the identities of confidential informants, a document reviewed by Bloomberg News shows.】

item.title: 力拓与嘉能可讨论潜在合并事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，力拓集团和嘉能可集团（Glencore Plc）一直在讨论合并业务的问题，这可能会成为该行业有史以来最大的一笔交易，并有可能重塑全球采矿业的格局。【原文：Rio Tinto Group and Glencore Plc have been discussing combining their businesses, according to people familiar with the matter, in what could result in the industry’s largest-ever deal and have the potential to reshape the global mining landscape.】

item.title: 文件显示：雪佛龙不顾制裁在委内瑞拉纳税
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）去年向委内瑞拉政府提交了价值约 3 亿美元的纳税申报单，这引发了人们的疑问：尽管受到制裁，尼古拉斯-马杜罗总统仍从这家美国公司的石油生产中获益多少。【原文：Chevron Corp. filed tax returns worth about $300 million with the Venezuelan government last year, raising questions about how much President Nicolás Maduro is benefiting from the US company’s oil production in spite of sanctions.】

item.title: 法律人工智能初创公司哈维估值将翻番至 30 亿美元
item.description:
Sequoia Capital 正在洽谈领投 3 亿美元的新一轮融资。【原文：

Sequoia Capital is in talks to lead $300 million round. 

】

item.title: 特朗普财政部长人选称中国经济陷入衰退
item.description: 当选总统唐纳德-特朗普提名的财政部长人选斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）形容世界第二大经济体正处于经济衰退，甚至是萧条之中。【原文：Scott Bessent, President-elect Donald Trump’s nominee for Treasury Secretary, described the world’s No. 2 economy as being in a recession, if not a depression.】

item.title: 任天堂的 Switch 2 来了。现在，一切都与游戏有关。
item.description:
马里奥制造商的新游戏机终于曝光了。但接下来的工作至关重要。【原文：

The Mario maker’s new console has been revealed at last. But what comes next is crucial.

】

item.title: 加拿大央行将在数月内结束量化紧缩政策
item.description: 加拿大央行表示，计划在今年上半年停止缩减资产负债表，这使其成为首批发出即将结束量化紧缩计划信号的主要央行之一。【原文：The Bank of Canada says it plans to stop shrinking its balance sheet in the first half of this year, making it one of the first major central banks to signal an imminent end to its quantitative tightening program.】

item.title: 德国口蹄疫导致 10 亿欧元农业销售额化为乌有
item.description: 农场合作社组织 DRV 表示，由于口蹄疫爆发导致出口受限，德国农业面临约 10 亿欧元（10.3 亿美元）的销售损失。【原文：Germany’s agriculture industry faces sales losses of about €1 billion ($1.03 billion) due to an outbreak of foot-and-mouth disease that has led to export restrictions, farm cooperatives group DRV said.】

item.title: 加拿大的反关税计划将针对美国铝和钢材
item.description: 一位知情官员表示，加拿大报复美国关税的计划草案可能会分阶段推出，政府准备在必要时对所有美国钢铁和铝产品征收反关税。【原文：Canada’s draft plan to retaliate against US tariffs may roll out in stages, with the government preparing to hit all American steel and aluminum products with counter-tariffs if necessary, said an official with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国对俄罗斯石油流量挤压最严重地区的权威指南
item.description: 美国对用于运输俄罗斯石油的油轮实施的最新制裁看来将对整个国家的出口机器造成严重破坏，如果以史为鉴的话，莫斯科的一些油轮将面临几乎全军覆没的危险。【原文：The latest US sanctions on oil tankers used to haul Russian petroleum look set to cause severe disruption across the nation’s export machine, with some of Moscow’s flows at risk of a near wipeout if history is any guide.】

item.title: WhatsApp 被俄罗斯黑客盯上，寻求乌克兰数据
item.description: 据微软公司称，一个与俄罗斯政府有关联的黑客组织试图窃取向乌克兰提供援助的非政府组织员工的 WhatsApp 数据。【原文：A hacking group linked to Russia’s government tried stealing WhatsApp data of employees at non-governmental organizations offering assistance to Ukraine, according to Microsoft Corp.】

item.title: 医疗保健投资者寄希望于国会阻挠小肯尼迪的计划
item.description: 表面上看，随着当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）再次入主白宫，美国医疗保健行业将在 2025 年迎来关键的一年。【原文：On the surface, the US health-care industry is facing a pivotal year in 2025 as President-elect Donald Trump re-enters the White House.】

item.title: 特朗普团队承诺延期，TikTok有望获得缓刑
item.description: 美国对字节跳动有限公司（ByteDance Ltd.）旗下 TikTok 的禁令将被推迟，因为该应用的销售截止日期正值周末假期，而美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普即将上任的政府承诺延期。【原文：A US ban on ByteDance Ltd.’s TikTok is poised to be delayed with a deadline for the sale of the app falling on a holiday weekend and President-elect Donald Trump’s incoming administration pledging an extension.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚极右翼党派开始推翻总统的长期斗争
item.description: 罗马尼亚极右翼政党在克劳斯-约哈尼斯总统任期届满后发起了暂停其职务的动议，他们认为约哈尼斯总统是非法的，从而在 5 月重新举行总统选举之前加大了对执政联盟的压力。【原文：Romania’s far-right parties launched a bid to suspend President Klaus Iohannis, whom they deem illegitimate after his term expired, ramping up pressure on the ruling coalition ahead of a rerun of presidential elections in May.】

item.title: Citadel 据称将从对冲基金 Farallon Capital 聘请 Hayday
item.description: 据知情人士透露，亿万富翁肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）创立的对冲基金 Citadel 已从 Farallon Capital Management 公司聘请了格雷戈里-海岱（Gregory Hayday）。【原文：Citadel, the hedge fund founded by billionaire Ken Griffin, has hired Gregory Hayday from Farallon Capital Management, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 交易员不愿逢低买进，巴拿马债券如履薄冰
item.description: 越来越多的策略师认为，对巴拿马遭受重创的债务来说，最坏的情况可能终于过去了。但仍在大幅下挫中挣扎的投资者并不买账。【原文：A growing chorus of strategists is saying the worst might be finally over for Panama’s hard-hit debt. Investors, still reeling from a sharp selloff, aren’t buying it just yet.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒尔称 6 月前可能再次降息
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）表示，如果通胀数据继续向好，美国央行可能会在 2025 年上半年再次降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said the US central bank could lower interest rates again in the first half of 2025 if inflation data continue to be favorable.】

item.title: 特朗普迈阿密度假村 30 亿美元公寓项目获批
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普下周将离开马阿拉歌，前往华盛顿宣誓就任总统。在他离开南佛罗里达州的途中，他的家族企业在当地取得了一场久违的胜利。【原文：Donald Trump will leave Mar-a-Lago and head to Washington next week to be sworn in as president. On his way out of South Florida, his family business scored a long-sought local victory.】

item.title: 洛杉矶大火考验惯于抵御灾难的债券市场
item.description: 市政债务有一个不争的事实：债券很少因自然灾害而变动。在上周洛杉矶的大火烧毁了数千处房产之前，这一久经考验的理念一直有效。【原文：There’s a truism in municipal debt: Bonds rarely move on natural disasters. That long-tested concept had held up until fires destroyed thousands of properties in Los Angeles last week.】

item.title: 通标标准技术服务有限公司（SGS）和必维国际检验集团（Bureau Veritas）希望通过合并节省 4 亿欧元开支
item.description: SGS SA 和必维国际检验集团（Bureau Veritas SA）正在寻求通过合作节省大量开支，双方正在商谈建立一个欧洲测试和认证冠军企业，其总市值将超过 330 亿美元。【原文：SGS SA and Bureau Veritas SA are seeking significant savings from a tie-up as talks advance to build a European champion for testing and certification with a combined market value of more than $33 billion.】

item.title: 融资成本上升，美国住宅建筑商销售预期下滑
item.description: 本月，美国住宅建筑商对销售前景的乐观情绪有所减弱，因为抵押贷款利率飙升可能会吓到购房者。【原文：US homebuilders grew less upbeat this month about sales prospects as surging mortgage rates risk spooking buyers.】

item.title: 世界上最大的新闻都与媒体有关
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 私募股权基金长期持有的资产面临困境
item.description: 私募股权公司通过转移资产来争取更多时间让投资取得成功的策略开始出现疲软迹象。【原文：Private equity firms’ strategy of shuffling assets to buy more time for investments to pan out is starting to show signs of weakness.】

item.title: 尼日利亚对经济区采取强硬措施以促进出口
item.description: 尼日利亚计划对其在非洲人口最多的国家运营的数十个自由关税区进行彻底改革，以打击滥用行为。【原文：Nigeria plans to overhaul scores of free customs zones it operates across Africa’s most populous nation to clamp down on misuse.】

item.title: 穆巴达拉（Mubadala）与格蒂尔（Getir）创始人因资产问题再次发生冲突
item.description: 土耳其快速杂货配送初创公司 Getir BV 创始人与其主要投资者穆巴达拉投资公司（Mubadala Investment Co.【原文：The latest round in the power struggle between the founders of Turkey’s quick grocery delivery startup Getir BV and its main investor Mubadala Investment Co. is set to come to a head in Amsterdam this weekend.】

item.title: 肯尼亚考虑出售主权美元债券以弥补日益增长的预算缺口
item.description: 尽管最近融资成本上升，肯尼亚仍计划利用国际投资者，发行主权美元债券，以应对不断扩大的预算缺口。【原文：Kenya plans to tap international investors and issue sovereign dollar bonds despite a recent increase in financing costs as it navigates a widening budget shortfall.】

item.title: 南非非法金矿中的死亡与绝望
item.description:
数百名非法矿工在地下被困数月之久，他们的困境凸显了非洲这个工业化程度最高的经济体中许多人所面临的绝望。【原文：

The plight of hundreds of illegal miners trapped underground for months highlights the desperation many face in Africa’s most industrialized economy.

】

item.title: 闭目养神的高收益新兴债券交易渐入尾声
item.description: 随着所有高收益债券的涨势开始减弱，新兴市场投资者正在挑选一些最弱发展中经济体的美元债券。【原文：Emerging-market investors are cherry-picking dollar bonds from some of the weakest developing economies as the rally in everything high-yield starts to fade.】

item.title: 特朗普财政部长人选贝森特确认听证会的最新进展
item.description: 斯科特-贝森特摄影师：阿尔-德拉戈/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Scott Bessent Photographer: Al Drago/Bloomberg】
